feedback: The applicant has a strong foundation in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and AI tools, but lacks specific experience with LLM agent frameworks like LangGraph.
Items like RAG pipelines and vector databases are only partially covered by the resume.
The applicant demonstrates strong cloud and deployment skills through AWS experiences, yet lacks Azure-specific mentions.
Education aligns well, with degrees in relevant fields, though the job prefers higher years of experience.
Certifications are missing, which could strengthen the credentials further.
Overall, the candidate has compelling projects under their belt enhancing their practical utility.
